Types

Point[Num] = object
  x*: Num
  y*: Num

Radian = distinct float
Vec = object
  x*, y*: float

Line = object
  x1*, x2*, y1*, y2*: float

Vec3 = object
  x*, y*, z*: float

Line3 = object
  s*, e*: Vec3

Size3 = object
  w*, d*, h*: float
